message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $6,000, you get $4,000. A good deal for both of us to start with.
Let's try a different split. I think 55-45 is a good compromise, considering the inflation.
Bob, the clock is ticking and this is impacting you more than me.  I'll take a bit more this round - $6,200.  Let's close this out.
I'm willing to take a bit more risk with the inflation, so I'll propose a 58-42 split. This is my best offer so far.
Bob, you're running out of time.  This is a final offer - $6,300 for me.  Take it or leave it.
